last_episode_to_air.name: Bee in a Jar
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Brian loses his job at the comic book shop to his big sister, Annie and Pony make it their mission to help her get another job.

name: It's Pony
overview: A normal girl’s life is made extraordinary by her best friend – an unpredictable, outrageous, and hilarious talking pony. No matter the complications he causes, Annie knows that everything is better when Pony is around.

episodes.name: Nosy Pony
episodes.overview: When Annie tries to stop Pony from being nosy, she creates a bigger problem that puts him in danger.

episodes.name: Beatrice
episodes.overview: When Annie takes pity on a lonely friend and lets her spend the day with Pony, she worries her friend is better at taking care of Pony than she is.

episodes.name: Unicorn
episodes.overview: When Pony thinks he turned into a unicorn, Annie uses him to raise money to save their sports court from closing.

episodes.name: Plants!
episodes.overview: Annie and Pony's camping trip is in jeopardy when Pony develops a fear of plants.

episodes.name: Game Horse
episodes.overview: Pony becomes a video game master, but when their friends are in danger Annie and Pony need to use their gaming skills to save them.

episodes.name: Heston's Coat
episodes.overview: Heston loans Annie his brand-new coat on a cold day, but Annie knows it's only a matter of time before Pony ruins it.

episodes.name: Horace
episodes.overview: Annie can avoid detention if she can heal the principal's dying plant, but the plan goes awry when Pony becomes attached to it.

episodes.name: The Boot
episodes.overview: Pony's half-baked plan causes Annie to lose one of her boots, which she desperately needs for a family photo!

episodes.name: Distractions
episodes.overview: Pony's constant distractions threaten to derail Annie's part of a science project Gerry is counting on her to do.

episodes.name: The Giving Chair
episodes.overview: On a trip to the bookstore, Annie and Pony discover the comfiest chair in the world that also may have superpowers.

episodes.name: Haircut
episodes.overview: When Annie needs a haircut, Pony proves that even a simple task can become a wild adventure.

episodes.name: Gerry's Birthday
episodes.overview: When Annie and Pony try to give Gerry the best birthday ever, their enthusiasm threatens to make it the worst.

episodes.name: Pet Pony
episodes.overview: When pets are banned from the building, Annie and Pony have to convince the landlord to reconsider.

episodes.name: Dog Day
episodes.overview: When the dog from next door, Pony’s sworn enemy, comes to stay with them, Annie needs to find a way to make them get along.

episodes.name: Useful
episodes.overview: Annie is worried that Dad will see Pony as useless and get rid of him.

episodes.name: Stompy!
episodes.overview: Annie is set to play in her first soccer game, until Pony accidentally stomps on her foot.

episodes.name: Delivery Pony
episodes.overview: Annie and Pony’s new fruit and vegetable delivery service is threatened by a big corporation.

episodes.name: Magic Annie
episodes.overview: Annie needs to find the perfect Mother’s Day gift. Pony is convinced that Annie’s magic trick is just the thing.

episodes.name: Bad Chicken
episodes.overview: Annie and Pony’s plan to teach a scrawny chicken confidence backfires when it terrorizes the city.

episodes.name: Gerry's Tour
episodes.overview: Annie and Pony try to help Gerry pass the test to become a museum tour guide.

episodes.name: 10 Minute Ticket
episodes.overview: In an effort to avoid paying for parking, the whole family must try and keep a visit to the mall to less than 10 minutes.

episodes.name: Clara Time
episodes.overview: Annie worries that their friend Clara is avoiding her and Pony.

episodes.name: Loud Horse
episodes.overview: When a noisy neighbor drives Annie to the brink, she and Pony have to find a way to quiet her down.

episodes.name: Sick Annie
episodes.overview: When Annie gets sick and can’t ride the new rollercoaster, Pony tries everything to make her better.

episodes.name: School Dance
episodes.overview: Everyone is dreading the Valentine’s school dance, so Annie and Pony try to get it cancelled.

episodes.name: Dad's Speech
episodes.overview: Annie tries to help Dad work through his stage fright by encouraging him to be more like Pony.

episodes.name: Scarecrow
episodes.overview: It’s Halloween and Annie and Pony have to save the family’s pumpkin crop from hungry crows.

episodes.name: Poneapples
episodes.overview: When apples that Pony has licked become a best seller, Annie is torn about coming clean.

episodes.name: Fan Pony
episodes.overview: Annie and Pony win a contest to meet a popstar dreamboat. Only problem is he’s not a fan of ponies.

episodes.name: Cop Mom
episodes.overview: When Mom joins the neighborhood watch, Annie and Pony think she’s a real-life action hero and need everyone to know.

episodes.name: Annie-versary
episodes.overview: When Pony celebrates a special day, Annie needs to figure out what’s so special about it.

episodes.name: Teacher's Pet
episodes.overview: Pony finally gets to go to school with Annie when he’s named class pet.

episodes.name: Trash Dash
episodes.overview: When Pony is accused of eating the park keeper’s precious daisies, Annie needs to prove his innocence.

episodes.name: Save the Took Took
episodes.overview: Everyone is raising money for charity, but Annie wants to find a cause that really needs her and Pony’s help.

episodes.name: Bramley Holiday
episodes.overview: The Bramleys need to find a way to celebrate their traditions while being together for the holiday.

episodes.name: The Wallet
episodes.overview: When Annie finds a lost wallet, she's determined to return it to its owner and prove she's a good person.

episodes.name: Locked Out
episodes.overview: When Annie and Pony get locked out of their building, they can't seem to convince their neighbors to let them back in.

episodes.name: Always Yes Annie
episodes.overview: Pony bets Annie that she can't go a whole day without saying no.

episodes.name: Sleepover
episodes.overview: Annie is determined to go to her first sleepover, but Pony’s homesickness threatens to change that.

episodes.name: Raiders of the Lost Cinema
episodes.overview: Annie decides this is the Halloween her and her friends will find the legendary, abandoned movie theater, with an entire snack counter filled with untouched candy. But Pony’s fear of scary things threatens to ruin Annie’s plans.

episodes.name: Annie's Voice
episodes.overview: When Annie loses her voice rehearsing her song for Winter Fest, Pony offers to speak for her, so she can get it back in time.

episodes.name: Business as Usual
episodes.overview: When Annie and Pony lose Dog, Pony has to take his place and fool Mrs. Ocaba until Annie can get him back.

episodes.name: Flight of the Chickens
episodes.overview: Annie wants to stay home alone, but when the chickens escape, she and Pony must get them back.

episodes.name: Henrietta the Psychic
episodes.overview: After Henrietta predicts that Pony will mess up Annie's attempt to win a contest, Pony believes she's a psychic.

episodes.name: Annie vs. Pony
episodes.overview: Annie enters Pony in a best pet competition, but Pony's got other ideas and enters a pet of his own.

episodes.name: Get Sapphire
episodes.overview: Annie and Pony are desperate to read the latest installment of a fantasy trilogy.

episodes.name: Pighog Day
episodes.overview: When Annie is chosen to take part in Pighog Day, she’s determined to do a good job despite everything going wrong.

episodes.name: Second Best Friend
episodes.overview: Annie's struggle to believe that Pony's second-best friend is a fly puts her own second-best friend, Gerry, in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Pony Car
episodes.overview: When Annie and her friends are invited to a fancy party, Pony decides they can't show up on foot and builds them a car.

episodes.name: Wedding Planners
episodes.overview: Annie and Pony try to use Mom and Dad's marriage certificate to claim a free vacation, but realize the certificate is a fake.

episodes.name: Cat Alley
episodes.overview: Annie tries to take a shortcut through an alley, but soon discovers that Pony's reluctant to go that way because the cats who live there have been terrorizing him.

episodes.name: Saving Horse
episodes.overview: When the park is vandalized with graffiti and Pony's favourite sculpture is threatened, Annie and Pony must find a way to stop the vandal.

episodes.name: Comic Connival
episodes.overview: At Comic Carnival, Pony accidentally gets Annie's favorite actress fired, so Annie needs to find a way to help her get her job back.

episodes.name: Horse on a Hot Tin Roof
episodes.overview: Pony gets jealous when Annie and her friends get cast in a play, so he uncharacteristically takes revenge on everyone.

episodes.name: Song of the Soil
episodes.overview: When Mom and Dad hurt their backs at harvest time, it's up to Annie and Pony to bring in the crops.

episodes.name: Street Smart
episodes.overview: When Pony invests Annie's savings in an obvious scam, Annie decides he's too trusting but her attempts to make him street smart backfire.

episodes.name: Ponopoly
episodes.overview: Annie worries her game night will be too boring, until Pony whips out his custom game, Ponopoly Plus.

episodes.name: President Annie
episodes.overview: The apartment building president tries to keep Annie and Pony from riding the elevator, so Annie decides she'll run for president against her.

episodes.name: Cow Power
episodes.overview: Annie and Pony adopt a cow to replace Dad's truck, but when it doesn't work out, it's impossible to get rid of it.

episodes.name: I.T. Pony
episodes.overview: Annie thinks Pony is a tech genius until his app creation puts the population in peril.

episodes.name: Family Free for All
episodes.overview: When the Bramleys are picked to be contestants on a game show, Annie worries that Pony's excitement will ruin their chance on TV.

episodes.name: Lucky Pony
episodes.overview: Pony believes he's a good luck charm and the reason Annie's suddenly a track star.

episodes.name: City Pony
episodes.overview: Annie worries that Pony's becoming too citified and jumps at the chance for the family to move to a real farm in the country.

episodes.name: Country Pony
episodes.overview: You can take the Pony out of the city, but you can't take the city out of the Pony.

episodes.name: Hot Tub Brine Machine
episodes.overview: Dad declares his pickle barrel "a time machine for vegetables."

episodes.name: The Secret Life of Pony
episodes.overview: Pony seems to be lying about what he does while Annie's in school, so she suspects he's living a secret life.

episodes.name: Space Shippers
episodes.overview: Annie and Pony worry that shy Gerry will never get together with Clara. They decide to take matters into their own hands.

episodes.name: The Lakey Loos
episodes.overview: The market's fishmonger believes there's a monster in the lake, but all his pictures look oddly like Pony.

episodes.name: Bowled Over
episodes.overview: Annie takes up bowling to impress a boy and Pony gets fingers!

episodes.name: Disaster Express
episodes.overview: When Pony thinks the subway ride to an escape room is the escape room, Annie needs to stop him from causing a public transportation disaster.

episodes.name: Pony Almighty
episodes.overview: Pony unearths a relic with a crude etching that seems to suggest he's an ancient god of mischief.

episodes.name: Annie the Influencer
episodes.overview: When Annie gets obsessed with a new social media app, Pony needs to do whatever it takes to bring her back to break the spell.

episodes.name: Never Take Advice From a Pony
episodes.overview: When Annie has a bad day, Pony comforts her with his soft nose and advice, but what happens when he starts giving everyone in town advice?

episodes.name: Moon Face-Off
episodes.overview: When Annie and Pony switch identities in a VR game, they find it's not so easy to walk in your best friend's shoes.

episodes.name: Pony, Come Home
episodes.overview: Annie & friends plan a heist to retrieve Pony from the rich kid who thinks he owns him now.

episodes.name: Special Sauce
episodes.overview: When Gerry adopts a pet rock and starts having Annie and Pony style adventures, they worry that they've lost their "special sauce".

episodes.name: Beachy Weachy Weach
episodes.overview: Annie wants to hang out on the local beach swim dock, but she keeps getting intercepted by the high schoolers.

episodes.name: Bee in a Jar
episodes.overview: When Brian loses his job at the comic book shop to his big sister, Annie and Pony make it their mission to help her get another job.
